NotificationTemplates.WelcomeEmailTemplate:
Welcome to Let Master Ug

your username is your email address and your One Time Password is {PASS}. Remember to change your password for enhanced security.

Best regards,
The Ug Let Master Team

NotificationTemplates.ArrearsEmailTemplate:
Dear {FULLNAME},

This is to politely remind you that there are outstanding arrears on your rental account(s) below.

{ACCOUNTS}


You are requested to settle your accounts at your earliest convenience to ensure that your account(s) remain in a good standing.

If you have already made this payment, please disregard this notice. Should you have any questions or need assistance, contact your property manager or our support team.

Best regards,
The Ug Let Master Team
NotificationTemplates.WelcomeSmsTemplate: Hello {FULLNAME} and welcome to the Let Master Ug platform. Check your email {EMAIL} for more details.
NotificationTemplates.ArrearsSmsTemplate: Hello {FULLNAME}. This is a friendly reminder that you have outstanding balances on your rental accounts: {SUMMARY}. Please make your payments at your earliest convenience. Thank you
NotificationTemplates.PaymentReceivedSms: Hello {FULLNAME}. Payment of UGX {AMT} for rental unit no. {ACC} received. New balance is UGX {BAL}. Thank you for paying.
